column3: Traffic;Kampot Province: An old foreigner (source says French
column4: but maybe a bad translation of ‘barang’)
column5: was involved in a motorcycle accident
column6: causing him injuries near the pagoda behind the Kampot provincial court.------The motorcycle rider involved in the crash escaped the scene
column7: leaving the injured man at the roadside.------The victim was taken to a local hospital to be treated for injuries to his face
